df-ssc
blocks.content: Define the subset relation for subcategories. Despite the name, this is not really a "category-aware" definition, which is to say it makes no explicit references to homsets or composition; instead this is a subset-like relation on the functions that are used as subcategory specifications in ~ df-subc , which makes it play an analogous role to the subset relation applied to the subgroups of a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ssc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cssc, copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wfn(cv(s1), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s2))), wrex(s3, cpw(cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cixp(s4, cxp(cv(s3), cv(s3)), cpw(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}

  ‚ä¢ C_cat = { < s0, s1 > | ‚àÉ(s2,(s1[Fn](s2 √ó s2)‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà P(s2), s0 ‚àà √ó(s4 ‚àà(s3 √ó s3), P((s1 ` s4))))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-resc
blocks.content: Define the restriction of a category to a given set of arrows. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: df-subc
blocks.content: ` ( Subcat `` C ) ` is the set of all the subcategory specifications of the category ` C ` . Like ~ df-subg , this is not actually a collection of categories (as in definition 4.1(a) of [Adamek] p. 48), but only sets which when given operations from the base category (using ~ df-resc ) form a category. All the objects and all the morphisms of the subcategory belong to the supercategory. The identity of an object, the domain and the codomain of a morphism are the same in the subcategory and the supercategory. The composition of the subcategory is a restriction of the composition of the supercategory. (Contributed by FL, 17-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: sscrel

} = {
  mpd(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wfn(c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))))))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wa(wfn(c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))))), wbr(c0, cssc, c2))
  brssc(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c2)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, wa(wfn(c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  adantld(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  rexlimdvw(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(c0, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  syl5(w0, wcel(c0, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))
  ixpfn(hs1, c0, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))
  ex(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))

  rexlimdvw(hs2, P(hs0), w0, c0 ‚àà √ó(hs1 ‚àà(hs2 √ó hs2), P((c2 ` hs1))), c0[Fn](c1 √ó c1))
  syl5(w0, c0 ‚àà √ó(hs1 ‚àà(hs2 √ó hs2), P((c2 ` hs1))), c0[Fn](c1 √ó c1), c0[Fn](hs2 √ó hs2))

  adantl(w0, c0[Fn](hs2 √ó hs2), dom(c0)=(hs2 √ó hs2))
  fndm(c0, (hs2 √ó hs2))

  |- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))

} = {
  mpd(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wa(wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))), wbr(c2, cssc, c0))
  brssc(hs0, hs2, hs1, c2, c0)

  adantrd(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cixp(hs1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cpw(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  ex(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))
  simpr(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))
  fneq2d(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cxp(c1, c1), wa(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))
  eqtr2d(cv(hs0), c1, cdm(cdm(c0)), wa(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))))
  syl6eq(cdm(cdm(c0)), cv(hs0), cdm(cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))
  dmeqd(cdm(c0), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))
  adantl(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))
  fndm(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  dmxpid(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

}

thm ssclem(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl5eqelr(c1, universe, cdm(cxp(c1, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  dmxpid(c1)
  dmexd(cxp(c1, c1), universe, wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  eqeltrrd(cxp(c1, c1), universe, cdm(c0), wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1)), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  fndm(c0, cxp(c1, c1))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexg(c0, universe)
  syl2an(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), universe))
  sqxpexg(c1, universe)
  fnex(c0, cxp(c1, c1), universe)
}

thm ssclem(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üî c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Fn](c1 √ó c1))
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)

  dmxpid(c1)
  dmexd((c1 √ó c1), universe, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå))
  eqeltrrd((c1 √ó c1), universe, dom(c0), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)=(c1 √ó c1))

  sqxpexg(c1, universe)
  fnex(c0, (c1 √ó c1), universe)
}

thm isssc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cssc, c1), wa(wss(c2, c3), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wss(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(c3, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cssc, c1), wa(wss(c2, c3), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wss(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), wrex(hs1, cpw(c3), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c3)), wral(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))))))
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cssc, c1), wrex(hs1, cpw(c3), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wrex(hs1, cpw(cv(hs2)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))))))
  syl5bb(w0, wbr(c0, cssc, c1), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wrex(hs1, cpw(cv(hs2)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))))), wex(hs2, wa(wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, cpw(cv(hs2)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))))))
  brssc(hs2, hs1, hs0, c0, c1)
  exbidv(hs2, w0, wa(wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, cpw(cv(hs2)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wrex(hs1, cpw(cv(hs2)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))))))
  anbi1d(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, cpw(cv(hs2)), wcel(c0, cixp(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))
  impbid(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))
  ex(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))
  3eqtr3g(cv(hs2), c3, cdm(cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), cdm(cxp(c3, c3)), wa(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))
  dmeqd(cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cxp(c3, c3), wa(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))
  eqtr3d(cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cxp(c3, c3), cdm(c1), wa(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))
  adantl(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))
  fndm(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))
  syl(wa(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c3, c3)), wfn(c1, cxp(c3, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wfn(c1, cxp(c3, c3)))
  fndm(c1, cxp(c3, c3))
  dmxpid(cv(hs2))
  dmxpid(c3)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wfn(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wfn(c1, cxp(c3, c3)))
  fneq2d(c1, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)), cxp(c3, c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs2), c3, wceq(cv(hs2), c3))

blocks.name: ssc1
blocks.content: Infer subset relation on objects from the subcategory subset relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssc1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c2, cxp(c0, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c3, cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cssc, c3))
} = {
  simpld(w0, wss(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wss(co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wss(co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))))), wbr(c2, cssc, c3))
  isssc(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, c1, universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, universe), wbr(c2, cssc, c3))
  brrelex2i(c2, cssc, c3)
  sscrel()
  ssclem(c3, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

} = {
  mpbiri(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(cres(c0, cxp(c3, c3)), cssc, c0), wa(wss(cin(c1, c3), c1), wral(hs0, cin(c1, c3), wral(hs1, cin(c1, c3), wss(co(cv(hs0), cres(c0, cxp(c3, c3)), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))))))
  pm3.2i(wss(cin(c1, c3), c1), wral(hs0, cin(c1, c3), wral(hs1, cin(c1, c3), wss(co(cv(hs0), cres(c0, cxp(c3, c3)), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))))
  inss1(c1, c3)

thm ssceq(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0)‚Üí c0 = c1)
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), c0 = c1, (dom(dom(c0))√ó dom(dom(c0)))=(dom(dom(c1))√ó dom(dom(c1))), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)),(hs0[c0]hs1)=(hs0[c1]hs1))))
  sqxpeqd(dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c1)), (c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0))
  eqssd(dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c1)), (c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0))
  ssc1(dom(dom(c1)), dom(dom(c0)), c1, c0, (c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c0)), (c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), (hs0[c0]hs1)=(hs0[c1]hs1))
  eqssd((hs0[c0]hs1), (hs0[c1]hs1), ((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)))))
  ssc2(hs0, c0, hs1, c1, dom(dom(c0)), ((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)))))
  adantr((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), (hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))), c0[Fn](dom(dom(c0))√ó dom(dom(c0))))
  adantr((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), (hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))), c0[C_cat]c1)
  ssc2(hs0, c1, hs1, c0, dom(dom(c1)), ((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)))))
  adantr((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), (hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))), c1[Fn](dom(dom(c1))√ó dom(dom(c1))))
  adantr((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), (hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))), c1[C_cat]c0)
  sseldd(hs0, dom(dom(c1)), dom(dom(c0)), ((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)))))
  simprl((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)))
  sseldd(hs1, dom(dom(c1)), dom(dom(c0)), ((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)))))
  adantr((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), (hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))), dom(dom(c0))‚äÜ dom(dom(c1)))
  ssc1(dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c1)), c0, c1, (c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0))
  simprr((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)))
  syl2anc((c0[C_cat]c1 ‚àß c1[C_cat]c0), (c0 = c1 ‚Üî((dom(dom(c0))√ó dom(dom(c0)))=(dom(dom(c1))√ó dom(dom(c1)))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)),(hs0[c0]hs1)=(hs0[c1]hs1))))), c0[Fn](dom(dom(c0))√ó dom(dom(c0))), c1[Fn](dom(dom(c1))√ó dom(dom(c1))))

thm rescval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, co(co(c0, cress, cdm(cdm(c2))), csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2))))

  elex(c2, c3)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, cresc, co(co(c0, cress, cdm(cdm(c2))), csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2)), co(co(cv(hs0), cress, cdm(cdm(cv(hs1)))), csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cv(hs1))))
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), cress, cdm(cdm(cv(hs1)))), csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cv(hs1)), co(c0, cress, cdm(cdm(c2))), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cress, cdm(cdm(cv(hs1))), c0, cdm(cdm(c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))

  dmeqd(cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))

thm issubc2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, cssc, c2), wral(s0, c3, wa(wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, wral(s3, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wral(s4, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wcel(co(cv(s4), co(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c5, cv(s2)), cv(s3)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(chomf, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccid, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cco, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c3, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)

  -| diffsc(s3, c3)

} = {
  issubc(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)

blocks.name: catsubcat
blocks.content: For any category ` C ` , ` C ` itself is a (full) subcategory of ` C ` , see example 4.3(1.b) in [Adamek] p. 48. (Contributed by AV, 23-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: subcfn
blocks.content: An element in the set of subcategories is a binary function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: subcss1
blocks.content: The objects of a subcategory are a subset of the objects of the original. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: subcid
blocks.content: The identity in a subcategory is the same as the original category. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm subcid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cfv(ccid, c2), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cresc, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(csubc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c4, cxp(c5, c5)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccid, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cfv(ccid, c2), c1), w0)
  fvmptd(hs0, cfv(ccid, c2), c1, cfv(c0, c1), c5, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), universe, w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(ccid, c2), cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, ccat))
  subccatid(hs0, c2, c5, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  fveq2d(c0, cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fvexd(c0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: issubc3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a subcategory, as a subset of the category which is itself a category. The assumption that the identity be closed is necessary just as in the case of a monoid, ~ issubm2 , for the same reasons, since categories are a generalization of monoids. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm issubc3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), w3a(wbr(c0, cssc, c2), wral(s0, c3, wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(c5, ccat))))

blocks.name: fullsubc
blocks.content: The full subcategory generated by a subset of objects is the category with these objects and the same morphisms as the original. The result is always a subcategory (and it is full, meaning that all morphisms of the original category between objects in the subcategory is also in the subcategory), see definition 4.1(2) of [Adamek] p. 48. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fullresc
blocks.content: The category formed by structure restriction is the same as the category restriction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fullresc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(cfv(chomf, c0), cfv(chomf, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccomf, c0), cfv(ccomf, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(chomf, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c3, cress, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c3, cresc, cres(c4, cxp(c5, c5))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wceq(cfv(chomf, c0), cfv(chomf, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccomf, c0), cfv(ccomf, c1)))
  comfeqd(c0, c1, w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(cco, c0), cfv(cco, c1), cfv(cco, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cco, c3), cfv(cco, c0)), wcel(c5, universe))
  ressco(c5, universe, cfv(cco, c3), c0, c3)
  rescco(cfv(cco, c3), c1, c3, cres(c4, cxp(c5, c5)), c2, ccat, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cco, c3))
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cfv(chomf, c0), cfv(chomf, c1)), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c1), cv(hs1))))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c5, c5, w0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c1), cv(hs1))))
  3eqtr3rd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c3), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  homfval(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1), cfv(chom, c3), c3, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), c2, c5, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  sseldd(cv(hs1), c2, c5, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5)), wss(c5, c2))
  eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(chom, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cres(c4, cxp(c5, c5)), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  ovresd(cv(hs0), c4, c5, cv(hs1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cres(c4, cxp(c5, c5)), cfv(chom, c1), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5)))
  reschom(cres(c4, cxp(c5, c5)), c1, c3, c2, ccat, c5, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(chom, c3), cfv(chom, c0), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chom, c3), cfv(chom, c0)), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl6eqel(c5, universe, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  resshom(c5, universe, cfv(chom, c3), c0, c3)
  eqid(cfv(chom, c3))
  homfeq(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c5, cfv(chom, c0), cfv(chom, c1), w0)
  eqid(cfv(chom, c0))
  eqid(cfv(chom, c1))
  syl(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(c5, c2))
  ressbas2(c5, c2, c0, c3)
  rescbas(c5, c1, c3, cres(c4, cxp(c5, c5)), c2, ccat, w0)
  sylancr(w0, wfn(cres(c4, cxp(c5, c5)), cxp(c5, c5)), wfn(c4, cxp(c2, c2)), wss(cxp(c5, c5), cxp(c2, c2)))
  homffn(c4, c2, c3)

  xpss12(c5, c2, c5, c2)
  fnssres(c4, cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c5, c5))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

thm fullresc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((Homf ` c0)=(Homf ` c1)‚àß(comf ` c0)=(comf ` c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Homf ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c3[|`s]c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c3[|`cat](c4 |`(c5 √ó c5)))
} = {
  jca(w0, (Homf ` c0)=(Homf ` c1), (comf ` c0)=(comf ` c1))
  comfeqd(c0, c1, w0)
  eqtr3d((comp ` c0), (comp ` c1), (comp ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, (comp ` c3)=(comp ` c0), c5 ‚àà ùïå)
  ressco(c5, universe, (comp ` c3), c0, c3)
  rescco((comp ` c3), c1, c3, (c4 |`(c5 √ó c5)), c2, ccat, c5, w0)
  eqid((comp ` c3))
  mpbird(w0, (Homf ` c0)=(Homf ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c5,(hs0[(Hom ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(Hom ` c1)]hs1))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c5, c5, w0, (hs0[(Hom ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(Hom ` c1)]hs1))
  3eqtr3rd((hs0[(Hom ` c0)]hs1), (hs0[(Hom ` c1)]hs1), (hs0[c4]hs1), (hs0[(Hom ` c3)]hs1), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5)))
  homfval(hs0, c4, hs1, (Hom ` c3), c3, c2, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5)))
  sseldd(hs0, c2, c5, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5)))
  sseldd(hs1, c2, c5, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5)))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5), c5 ‚äÜ c2)
  eqtr3d((hs0[c4]hs1), (hs0[(Hom ` c1)]hs1), (hs0[(c4 |`(c5 √ó c5))]hs1), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5)))
  ovresd(hs0, c4, c5, hs1, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 ‚àà c5, hs1 ‚àà c5)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c5, hs1 ‚àà c5)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (c4 |`(c5 √ó c5)), (Hom ` c1), w0, (hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5))
  reschom((c4 |`(c5 √ó c5)), c1, c3, c2, ccat, c5, w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (Hom ` c3), (Hom ` c0), w0, (hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c5))
  syl(w0, (Hom ` c3)=(Hom ` c0), c5 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqel(c5, universe, (Base ` c0), w0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  resshom(c5, universe, (Hom ` c3), c0, c3)
  eqid((Hom ` c3))
  homfeq(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c5, (Hom ` c0), (Hom ` c1), w0)
  eqid((Hom ` c0))
  eqid((Hom ` c1))
  syl(w0, c5 =(Base ` c0), c5 ‚äÜ c2)
  ressbas2(c5, c2, c0, c3)
  rescbas(c5, c1, c3, (c4 |`(c5 √ó c5)), c2, ccat, w0)
  sylancr(w0, (c4 |`(c5 √ó c5))[Fn](c5 √ó c5), c4[Fn](c2 √ó c2), (c5 √ó c5)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c2))
  homffn(c4, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c5 √ó c5)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c2), c5 ‚äÜ c2, c5 ‚äÜ c2)
  xpss12(c5, c2, c5, c2)
  fnssres(c4, (c2 √ó c2), (c5 √ó c5))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c((Hom ` c0))

  diff.hs1.c((Hom ` c1))
}

blocks.name: resscat
blocks.content: A category restricted to a smaller set of objects is a category. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm resscat(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), ccat))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cress, c1), ccat, co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cress, c1), co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  ressinbas(c1, c2, c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), ccat), wcel(co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))), ccat))
  catpropd(co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))), universe, ccat, wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chomf, co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))), cfv(chomf, co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))))), wceq(cfv(ccomf, co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))), cfv(ccomf, co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))))))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccomf, co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))), cfv(ccomf, co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))))), wceq(cfv(chomf, co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))), cfv(chomf, co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))))))
  fullresc(co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, cfv(chomf, c0), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqid(co(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  ovexd(c0, cress, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  subccat(co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))), c0, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqid(co(c0, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c0), cxp(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))))
  fullsubc(cfv(chomf, c0), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), c0, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(chomf, c0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  inss2(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resscat(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Cat ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c0[|`s]c1)‚àà Cat)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[|`s]c1), ccat, (c0[|`s](c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))), (c0 ‚àà Cat ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Cat, c1 ‚àà c2, (c0[|`s]c1)=(c0[|`s](c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))))

  mpbird((c0 ‚àà Cat ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c0[|`s](c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0)))‚àà Cat, (c0[|`cat]((Homf ` c0)|`((c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))√ó(c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0)))))‚àà Cat)

blocks.name: subsubc
blocks.content: A subcategory of a subcategory is a subcategory. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)

thm subsubc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c1, cresc, c0))
} = {
  biancomd(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c1))), wa(wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3))))
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0))
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))
  subcssc(c2, cfv(chomf, c3), c3, wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)))
  id(wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  3bitr4rd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubc, c1)), w3a(wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c1)), wral(hs0, cdm(cdm(c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccid, c1), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(c1, cresc, c2), ccat)), w3a(wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)), wral(hs0, cdm(cdm(c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(c3, cresc, c2), ccat)))
  3anbi123d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c1)), wral(hs0, cdm(cdm(c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccid, c1), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(c1, cresc, c2), ccat), wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)), wral(hs0, cdm(cdm(c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(c3, cresc, c2), ccat))
  2thd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wbr(c0, cssc, cfv(chomf, c1)))
  subcssc(c0, cfv(chomf, c1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  ssctr(c2, c0, cfv(chomf, c1))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wbr(c2, cssc, cfv(chomf, c3)))
  breq2d(c2, cssc, c0, cfv(chomf, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  reschomf(c0, c3, c1, cfv(cbs, c1), ccat, cdm(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  subcss1(cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cbs, c1), c0, c1, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  ralbidva(hs0, cdm(cdm(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccid, c1), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))))
  eleq1d(cfv(cfv(ccid, c1), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(ccid, c3), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cdm(c2)))))
  subcid(cfv(ccid, c1), cv(hs0), c3, c1, c0, cdm(cdm(c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cdm(c2)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cdm(c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cdm(c2))), wfn(c0, cxp(cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)))))
  sselda(cv(hs0), cdm(cdm(c2)), cdm(cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  eleq1d(co(c1, cresc, c2), ccat, co(c3, cresc, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  syl5req(co(c1, cresc, c2), co(c3, cresc, c2), co(co(c1, cresc, c0), cresc, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  oveq1i(c3, cresc, c2, co(c1, cresc, c0))
  rescabs(c1, c0, c2, ccat, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c2)), universe, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wcel(cdm(cdm(c0)), universe))
  dmexd(cdm(c0), universe, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  dmexg(c0, cfv(csubc, c1))
  ssc1(cdm(cdm(c2)), cdm(cdm(c0)), c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wfn(c0, cxp(cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)))))
  subcfn(c0, cdm(cdm(c0)), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  eqidd(cdm(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  issubc3(hs0, c2, c1, cfv(chomf, c1), cdm(cdm(c2)), cfv(ccid, c1), co(c1, cresc, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(chomf, c1))
  eqid(cfv(ccid, c1))
  eqid(co(c1, cresc, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wcel(c1, ccat))
  subcrcl(c0, c1)
  issubc3(hs0, c2, c3, cfv(chomf, c3), cdm(cdm(c2)), cfv(ccid, c3), co(c3, cresc, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(chomf, c3))
  eqid(cfv(ccid, c3))
  eqid(co(c3, cresc, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0), wcel(c3, ccat))
  subccat(c3, c1, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  id(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  sscfn1(c2, cdm(cdm(c2)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0))
  eqidd(cdm(cdm(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wbr(c2, cssc, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(chomf, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cdm(c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cresc, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(chomf, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c3, cresc, c2))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c3)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚àß c2[C_cat]c0)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c1[|`cat]c0)
} = {
  biancomd(c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c3), c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1), c2[C_cat]c0)
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c3), (c2[C_cat]c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)), (c2[C_cat]c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c3)))
  pm4.71rd(c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c3), c2[C_cat]c0)

  3bitr4rd((c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚àß c2[C_cat]c0), c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c3), c2 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1), (c2[C_cat](Homf ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c2)),((Id ` c1)` hs0)‚àà(hs0[c2]hs0))‚àß(c1[|`cat]c2)‚àà Cat), (c2[C_cat](Homf ` c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c2)),((Id ` c3)` hs0)‚àà(hs0[c2]hs0))‚àß(c3[|`cat]c2)‚àà Cat))

  2thd((c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚àß c2[C_cat]c0), c2[C_cat](Homf ` c1), c2[C_cat](Homf ` c3))

  subcssc(c0, (Homf ` c1), c1, (c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚àß c2[C_cat]c0))
  ssctr(c2, c0, (Homf ` c1))
  biimpa(c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1), c2[C_cat]c0, c2[C_cat](Homf ` c3))
  breq2d(c2, cssc, c0, (Homf ` c3), c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1))
  reschomf(c0, c3, c1, (Base ` c1), ccat, dom(dom(c0)), c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1))

  eqid((Base ` c1))
  ralbidva(hs0, dom(dom(c2)), (c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚àß c2[C_cat]c0), ((Id ` c1)` hs0)‚àà(hs0[c2]hs0), ((Id ` c3)` hs0)‚àà(hs0[c2]hs0))
  eleq1d(((Id ` c1)` hs0), (hs0[c2]hs0), ((Id ` c3)` hs0), ((c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚àß c2[C_cat]c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c2))))
  subcid((Id ` c1), hs0, c3, c1, c0, dom(dom(c0)), ((c0 ‚àà(Subcat ` c1)‚àß c2[C_cat]c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà dom(dom(c2))))
